overview:
Runs communications programs at Dwolla.

Jordan has been with the payments company since early 2010, when he worked with company founder, Ben Milne, in ramping up its regional and national visibility. Since coming on full-time in early 2011, Jordan has overseen the strategic messaging and external communications for the startup.
